attributes.action: Self isolating vulnerable people/carers to receive some pay during pandemic
attributes.additional_details: People with underlying health issues and their carers should receive some sort of pay if they choose to self isolate and protect themselves/their dependents during the COVID-19 pandemic. This could potentially be for months and people need income to live, especially if they are not receiving wages from their employers.
attributes.background: Ensure anyone of any age with underlying health issues and their carer(s) receive some sort of pay if they choose to self isolate during the COVID-19 pandemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303345

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
